item.title: Oracle’s stock surges toward its best day since 1999. These huge numbers explain why.

item.title: GameStop posts fifth straight quarterly profit, thanks to a big sales jump
item.description: OG meme stock reported a 22% rise in sales and a fifth consecutive profit, sending the stock more than 5% higher after hours Tuesday.

item.title: ‘He is increasingly angry’: My troubled son lives with me. How do I ensure he is financially secure after I die?
item.description: “Our family does have a long history of interventions, including hospitalizations.”

item.title: Nvidia and its Big Tech peers have $1 trillion to spend. What should they do with it?
item.description: The ‘Magnificent Seven’ could end the year with a combined operating cash flow and net cash of more than $1 trillion. HSBC analysts see a few uses for...
